channel.title: Realm Onwards - The RSPS for Newcomers - Delta Version
channel.description:
[center] Click [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,533631.0.html]here[/url] for the PI version.
[size=36pt] Realm Onwards The RSPS for Newcomers Delta Version
[URL=http://img268.imageshack.us/i/89501017.png/][IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/205/89501017.png[/img][/URL] [/size]
[URL=http://img839.imageshack.us/i/52195194.png/][IMG]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/301/52195194.png[/img][/URL][/center]
I am deciding to make a new project. I named it "Realm Onwards". I believe that this will work through, and make a nice base for new coders. This will have different versions, though it's not like v1 and v2, it's like PI version and Delta version. You better see this when it's done :p.
This is going to be for all the newcomers. Don't some of the "Server Help" guys get annoyed? This was designed to make less of those common sense things. Unlike Blankscape or "Blank Source + Client" this works upon all sources, ranging from 317 delta to those of 562.
As I said before, this was partly designed to keep common sense topic out. My main point is to help the community. I have always had a feeling in my life to help all, not leave anyone behind. If I do, I'll get really regretful mode. The goal is: "Learning's Fun!" I would like to make a fun, creative, and most of all learning server for newcomers
This server provides:
Complete Started Not Started
[ul][li]The Incredible Learning Center[/li] [li]Far-range bows[/li] [li]Far-range magic[/li] [li]A Reasonable Starter[/li] [li]Blocking spammers[/li] [li]A life-like rsps dialogue such as "How are you doing?" from Man[/li] [li]Full doors[/li] [li]Clipped Following[/li] [li]Combat following[/li] [li]100% Pking[/li] [li]100% Bridding/Item Switching[/li] [li]Perfect Xp rates[/li] [li]NO DUPES[/li] [li]THERE IS NO "DONATOR ONLY" ITEMS! Anyone can use anything if they have the proper requirements![/li] [li]A perfect economy server[/li] [li]Every single skill works[/li] [li]Packaging (with no upper case letters like others :P)[/li] [li]Say bye to dead code![/li] [li]Better Combat System[/li] [li]Everything explained[/li] [li]Tutorial Island[/li] [li]Give you a cookie for reading this[/li][/ul]
[b]Delta_:[/b] For Delta. [b]Moparscape:[/b] Awesome forums! [b]Arham 4:[/b] Adding things to server [b]Some tutorials:[/b] For providing things to help this. [b]RS2007:[/b] An amazing base for source and client.

item.title: Realm Onwards - The RSPS for Newcomers - Delta Version
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[center]
Click here for the PI version.

[size=36pt]
Realm Onwards
The RSPS for Newcomers
Delta Version


[/size]

[/center]

I am deciding to make a new project. I named it “Realm Onwards”. I believe that this will work through, and make a nice base for new coders. This will have different versions, though it’s not like v1 and v2, it’s like PI version and Delta version. You better see this when it’s done :p.

This is going to be for all the newcomers. Don’t some of the “Server Help” guys get annoyed? This was designed to make less of those common sense things. Unlike Blankscape or “Blank Source + Client” this works upon all sources, ranging from 317 delta to those of 562.

As I said before, this was partly designed to keep common sense topic out. My main point is to help the community. I have always had a feeling in my life to help all, not leave anyone behind. If I do, I’ll get really regretful mode. The goal is: “Learning’s Fun!” I would like to make a fun, creative, and most of all learning server for newcomers

This server provides:

Complete
Started
Not Started

[ul][li]The Incredible Learning Center[/li]
[li]Far-range bows[/li]
[li]Far-range magic[/li]
[li]A Reasonable Starter[/li]
[li]Blocking spammers[/li]
[li]A life-like rsps dialogue such as “How are you doing?” from Man[/li]
[li]Full doors[/li]
[li]Clipped Following[/li]
[li]Combat following[/li]
[li]100% Pking[/li]
[li]100% Bridding/Item Switching[/li]
[li]Perfect Xp rates[/li]
[li]NO DUPES[/li]
[li]THERE IS NO “DONATOR ONLY” ITEMS! Anyone can use anything if they have the proper requirements![/li]
[li]A perfect economy server[/li]
[li]Every single skill works[/li]
[li]Packaging (with no upper case letters like others :P)[/li]
[li]Say bye to dead code![/li]
[li]Better Combat System[/li]
[li]Everything explained[/li]
[li]Tutorial Island[/li]
[li]Give you a cookie for reading this[/li][/ul]

Delta_: For Delta.
Moparscape: Awesome forums!
Arham 4: Adding things to server
Some tutorials: For providing things to help this.
RS2007: An amazing base for source and client.
